input.sentences: the old ruins had many secrets .
archaeologists have dug up many neat things .
they found old tools for mashing things .
and they also found old coins .
this is an example of ancient pottery .
output.sentences: Not too long ago scientists discovered some new secrets in some ancient ruins.
Archaeologists were careful as they dug a neat hole to pull out the treasures.
Tools were found that were used for mashing things up.
They also found some valuable coins.
My favorite discovery was the ancient pottery.
